alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide; Upper Gunnison River Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 2:42PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Delta and northeastern Montrose Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 241 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Montrose, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Olathe around 300 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hotchkiss. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 550 in Colorado between mile markers 121 and 130. U.S. Highway 50 in Colorado between mile markers 76 and 99. Colorado 65 between mile markers 1 and 12. Colorado 90 between mile markers 82 and 89. Colorado 92 between mile markers 4 and 30. Colorado 133 between mile markers 1 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide; Upper Gunnison River Valley
